text.confirm: If you delete an application, all information will be lost
text.buy_end: Your application has beed sending. Our manager will contact you as soon as possible, thank you!
text.sell_end: We have received your payment. "Funds" will come to your indicated account soon. Payment confirmation you will also receive in your mail
text.wait: Please wait, we are checking your payment
text.not_paid: We have not received your payment. or connect with support
text.no_data_of_numbers: Please enter some information for currency exchange
text.server_not_available: Sorry, but the server is unavailable. Please try again later
text.accept_si: Sorry, but you must accept the service's rules
text.time_is_up: Your time is up. The transaction was canceled automatically

timer_to_reload.if_press_button: If you click the "reload the page" button, the page will be reloaded.
timer_to_reload.reload_after: The page will reload automatically in

deferred_redirect.if_press_button: If you click the "to home page" button, then you will go to the main page, where you can log in to your personal account by clicking "Login".
deferred_redirect.redirect_after: The page will be redirected automatically in

text.all_end:
Your application is accepted.
We have sent you an email box the letter with further instructions
